com.kii.cloud.unity

Class AbstractGcmIntentService

  • java.lang.Object
    • IntentService
      • com.kii.cloud.unity.AbstractGcmIntentService
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    GcmIntentService

    public abstract class AbstractGcmIntentService
extends IntentService
    AbstractGcmIntentService is a base class for Services that handle GCM(Google Cloud Messaging). You can change a behavior when a push notification is received to override the onHandlePushMessage method.
    Author:
    noriyoshi.fukuzaki@kii.com
